page.title: 03NOSTELL PRIORY ESTATE
page.content: {Nostell Priory}estate dominates much of the Western area of our D-Block and has been owned by the{Winn}family since 1654. It comprises over 2,5OO acres of parkland, woodland, 3 lakes, farmland and numerous cottages as well as the Priory itself. The estate employs over forty people who work in such varied jobs as running the garden centre, working for the{National Trust,}and running the holiday homes as well as those in farming. Although the estate farms some of the land itself most of the land is let out to tenants who are involved in both arable and pasture farming. The estate holds many special events each year such as the country fair, bonfire nights and music festivals. {Pop festivals}have now been cancelled because of{drugs}problems.
